Introduction
This topic contains information about correcting deficiencies in rating decisions whether found prior to promulgation or after promulgation and issuance, including
correcting
narrative deficiencies before or after authorization
, and
the
Codesheet
before or after authorization
procedure for correction of rating decisions
, and
revising erroneous anatomical qualifiers
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section E - Reviewing the Rating Decision
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section E
